title: Headbandz

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Record "yes" on one switch and "no" on the other.
• The switch user works with you to help you guess the picture on your card by answering your yes/no questions using their switches.
• The more answers the switch user gives to help you guess correctly, the more points they earn!
• You can also play this game in two teams to add a competitive element.

tooltipText: Use 2 switches to answer yes/no questions in a game of HeadBandz
